form.label: Summary Table: Phase 2: Compute Train Stats

panel.title: Compute Train Stats in Summary Index

table.title: Take all late values and compute stats for them.

search.query: index=summary | eval lates=split(lates, ",") | mvexpand lates | eval lateness=case( lates > 15, "> 15 min", lates > 5, "> 5 min", true(), "<= 5 min") | timechart span=1d count by lateness | eval total='<= 5 min' + '> 5 min' + '> 15 min' | eval pct_late = (('> 5 min' + '> 15 min') / total) * 100 | fields - total | timechart span=1d sum("<= 5 min") as under_5_min sum("> 5 min") as over_5 sum("> 15 min") as over_15 avg(pct_late) as pct_late | eval pct_late=pct_late | eval under_5_min=under_5_min | eval over_5=over_5 | eval over_15=over_15 | collect index=summary sourcetype=lates_by_day2
